trans-unit.source: Abstract base class for a serializer that can serialize and deserialize key identifier clauses.
trans-unit.target: 序列化程式可以序列化和還原序列化金鑰識別碼子句的抽象基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Key identifier clauses are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause> class and by classes derived from it.
trans-unit.target: 表示金鑰識別碼子句的<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>類別，並由類別中，衍生自它。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClauseSerializer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClauseSerializer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a value that indicates whether the element where the specified reader is positioned can be read as a key identifier clause by the handler.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回值，指出是否位於指定的讀取器的項目可以讀取金鑰識別碼子句的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the XML can be read as a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause> of the <xref:System.Type> processed by the derived handler.
trans-unit.target: 檢查是否可做為讀取 XML<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>的<xref:System.Type>衍生的處理常式所處理。</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>

trans-unit.source: An XML reader positioned at the start element of the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: XML 讀取器定位在金鑰識別碼子句的開始項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the XML can be deserialized to a key identifier clause by the handler; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 XML 可還原序列化金鑰識別碼子句的處理常式。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a value that indicates whether the specified key identifier clause can be serialized by the handler.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回值，指出是否可序列化指定的金鑰識別碼子句的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause to check.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查的金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key identifier clause can be serialized by the handler, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以序列化金鑰識別碼子句，處理常式，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, deserializes a key identifier clause from by using the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會使用指定的 XML 讀取器還原序列化從金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: An XML reader positioned at the start element of the key identifier clause to read.
trans-unit.target: XML 讀取器定位在金鑰識別碼子句的開始項目讀取。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause that was deserialized from the XML.
trans-unit.target: 從 XML 還原序列化金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, serializes the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，序列化指定的金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: The XML Writer to use to serialized the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 XML 寫入器序列化金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 序列化金鑰識別碼子句。
